response.overview: The Poetic Self-Defense project presents 12 video poems by slammers from the feminist artists' collective L-SLAM. Under the direction of director Vinciane Zech, the slammers denounce discrimination linked to gender, LGBTQIA+ experiences, racism, disabilities, etc., and bring their powerful words to bear on individual self-repair and collective empowerment. This project is part of the "Tant qu'il le faudra" call for projects launched by the Secrétariat d'Etat à l'Égalité des genres, à l'Égalité des chances et à la Diversité, in collaboration with the Festival de Liège, the GSARA and the production company La démise en boîte.
response.title: Autodéfense poétique
